short_summary: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares: Back shell Electrical Connector, Cable Assembly Special Purpose Electrical, Cable Power Electrical, Fuse Cartridge, Antenna Portable Test
full_summary:
# Multiple Victoria-Class Spares: Back Shell Electrical Connector, Cable Assembly Special Purpose Electrical, Cable Power Electrical, Fuse Cartridge, Antenna Portable Test
## Tender Information: #cb-6468-14417823 (Version 2)
## Solicitation Number: W8482-230813/A

### Tender Announcement Overview

The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Multiple Victoria-Class Spares, comprising a range of electrical components. The tender focuses on acquiring goods from suppliers and invites eligible companies to submit bids.

### Key Tender Details
* **Start Date:** 2023-07-27
* **Closing Date:** 2023-07-27T14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date:** 2023-09-25
* **Contract End Date:** 2024-03-28
* **Deliveries:** CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax

### Delivery Items
We are seeking the following items:

1.  Back Shell Electrical Connector (Article 001)
	* NSN: 01-3555936, GSIN: 5935, Part No.: B-150-05, Quantity: 100 units
	* Associated with CFB Esquimalt
2.  Cable Assembly Special Purpose Electrical (Article 003)
	* NSN: 99-7750332, GSIN: 5995, Part No.: 152573-A2, Quantity: 10 units
	* Associated with CFB Esquimalt
3.  Cable Power Electrical (Article 005)
	* NSN: 99-4960332, GSIN: 6145, Part No.: EPD37822A, Quantity: 100 units
	* Associated with CFB Esquimalt
4.  Fuse Cartridge (Article 007)
	* NSN: 99-6573573, GSIN: 5920, Part Nos.: 217-250, 416-225, 25411-01010, Quantity: 25 units
	* Associated with CFB Esquimalt
5.  Antenna Portable Test (Article 009 and 011)
	* NSNs: 20-A0X4958 and 20-A0X4959, GSIN: 5985, Part Nos.: MDF930X and 60100, Quantity: 5 units
	* Associated with CFB Esqu
